meanings.definition: To surpass in avoiding bad luck or misfortune.
meanings.sent1: She always outjinxes her friends by carrying a lucky charm with her.
meanings.sent2: He outjinxes everyone by never walking under ladders.
meanings.sent3: The cat outjinxes the black cat by always finding a sunny spot to nap in.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude outjinxes any bad luck that comes her way.
meanings.sent5: The horseshoe above the door outjinxes any potential misfortune from entering the house.

meanings.definition: To outdo in avoiding a curse or spell.
meanings.sent1: The witch outjinxes her enemies by casting protective spells.
meanings.sent2: He outjinxes the curse by wearing an amulet around his neck.
meanings.sent3: The wizard outjinxes the evil sorcerer by brewing a potion of protection.
meanings.sent4: Her magical amulet outjinxes any dark magic aimed at her.
meanings.sent5: The enchanted mirror outjinxes any curse reflected upon it.
